CifraClub Better UI

Enhance your CifraClub experience with CifraClub Better UI, a Chrome extension designed to improve the layout and usability of CifraClub song pages.

Features

- Horizontal Layout: Displays song sheets side by side for easier navigation and comparison.
- Default Settings:
  - Two Columns for Chords enabled by default for a clearer view.
  - Tablatures are disabled by default to reduce clutter.
- Custom Styling: Applies sleek and modern styles to make your browsing experience more enjoyable.
- Easy Installation: Quick setup with just a few clicks.

How to Use

1. Install the Extension: Add CifraClub Better UI from the Chrome Web Store.
2. Navigate to CifraClub: Visit any song page on www.cifraclub.com.br and click on print ("imprimir") to see the enhanced layout.
3. Enjoy an Improved Experience: Browse songs with a more organized and visually appealing interface.

Why Choose CifraClub Better UI?

- Improved Readability: The horizontal layout makes it easier to follow along with your favorite songs.
- Customization: Automatically sets your preferred viewing options, saving you time and effort.
- Lightweight: Minimal impact on browser performance while providing maximum benefits.

Upgrade your CifraClub browsing with CifraClub Better UI and enjoy a more streamlined and pleasant songwriting experience!
